content.rendered:
beauty bar in leaside | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in leaside, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options
Print directions Reset directions
Fetching directions......
Reset directions
Print directions
beauty bar in leaside | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 1657 bayview avenue east york, ontario
  • 416-901-6109
  • leaside@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

tue. - fri: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I came in today to switch my appointment due to unforeseen circumstances and the customer service was wonderful, the woman behind the desk was so kind and understanding. I will definitely be back!!!
Juliana P
1722693659
Excellent service and accommodation for me today. I recently had a manicure out of province and it was a bit of a botched job due to the polish they used. Not being aware of their assessment upon arrival, the team was able to adapt and give me a new set of nails. Thank you!!
Michelle Yeung
1721489734
Wonderful manicure experience! Everyone was friendly, efficient and knowledgeable. I appreciated the help picking a colour that would go with the dress for my birthday.
Olga K
1717203491
Had a wonderful, relaxing pedicure today with Bindu. After a long day at work on my feet, this was the ultimate way to unwind. Bindu carefully trimmed my nails and tended to beautifying my feet and it didn't hurt once. She helped me to choose a colour I was happy with. I couldn't be more... satisfied.read more
C. M.
1715306801
Went to the ten spot to get a brow lamination and they did a great job! If you're looking for a brow lam, this is definitely the place to get it done! They are super accommodating and make you feel comfortable with the entire procedure.
Jevica J
1709086080
Oh my, I’m never going back to the usual nail salons again! One spot was clean, friendly and my gel pedicure was exceptional! I was not rushed out the door or fit in like a sardine. Well worth the money!! Kristen did a great job. Thanks, and you will definitely see me again.
Maureen Snow
1708874595
Jenny is amazing! She is so knowledgeable about everything to do with aesthetics. Highly recommend for any service. She always makes me smile and is professional while being warm as well. The front desk staff are quite nice as well. Overall, highly recommend especially for waxing and facial... services!read more
Olivia Luka
1704334424
Madhu has been my esthetician for a while now because she’s professional and knowledgeable. Clean place, professional. Quick to book up so book early!!
Karen Lam
1699146153
Went for a brazilly and Jenny was amazing! She made sure I was comfortable and took my mind off of the pain. I'm definitely going back, their customer service is top notch. Thank you Jenny, you're awesome
Jackie Willis
1693527546
Excellent customer service! Went for a shellac manicure and kiddie manicure. Everyone was very friendly and welcoming. The kiddie manicure was perfect for my daughter, nothing too invasive just a simple nail painting and massage. My manicure was great, they were very gentle with my cuticles and the... shellac is still intact with no chips 3 days later (very rare for me)! We will definitely go back for another girls day!read more
valerie Kujbus
1680110941
I’m so happy to have found Jenny!I’ve moved into the neighbourhood during the lockdown, so never had a chance to research the local salon/spa scene until very recently, and frankly, was a little hesitant about the change, but I absolutely do not regret the decision!Jenny was super-sweet and... attentive, made sure I was feeling comfortable during both waxing and manicure, and I ended up super-happy with the results!read more
Jay H
1627693499
‹
›
